title: The Saudi Prince and the Pauper
description: On 20 October 2010, Saud Abdulaziz bin Nasser al Saud, a grandson of the King of Saudi Arabia, was sentenced to 20 years for strangling and beating Bandar Abdulaziz to death. Bandar was his servant, his lover, his punch-bag and his slave.The drama takes place in the police station and courtroom, with commentary by Omar, an anonymous Saudi blogger.
author: Neil McKay
